Package s2r2.scene

This package implements scenes and all supported basic primitives

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Scene This class represents a scene
SceneLight This class implements a light
SceneObject Abstract base class for objects
ScenePlane A plane
ScenePlaneXZ X-axis and Z-axis aligned plane
SceneRectangleXZ X-axis and Z-axis aligned plane
SceneSphere This class implements a sphere
 

Enum Summary
SceneObject.Type Object type

This package implements scenes and all supported basic primitives
